text: nīṅkaḷ eṅkiruntapōtilum maraṇam uṅkaḷai aṭaintē tīrum; mikap palamāṉa uyarnta (kōṭṭai) kottaḷattiṉ mītu nīṅkaḷ iruntapōtilum cariyē! (Napiyē! Umatu kaṭṭaḷaippaṭi pōrukkuc ceṉṟa) avarkaḷai oru naṉmai aṭaiyum paṭcattil ‘‘itu allāhviṭamiruntu (eṅkaḷukkuk) kiṭaittatu'' eṉak kūṟukiṉṟaṉar. Avarkaḷukku oru tīṅku ēṟpaṭṭu viṭṭālō ‘‘(napiyē!) Itu um'māltāṉ (eṅkaḷukku ēṟpaṭṭatu)'' eṉak kūṟukiṉṟaṉar. (Ākavē,) nīr kūṟuvīrāka: ‘‘(Nāṉāka eṉ iṣṭappaṭi uṅkaḷukkuk kaṭṭaḷaiyiṭavillai. Allāh aṟivittapaṭiyē nāṉ uṅkaḷukku kaṭṭaḷaiyiṭṭēṉ. Ākavē,) aṉaittum allāhviṭamiruntē kiṭaikkiṉṟaṉa. Ivarkaḷukku eṉṉa nērntuviṭṭatu? Evviṣayattaiyumē ivarkaḷ aṟintu koḷvatillaiyē
